title: I want to create a new account
body: When I try to create a new account for North America( I live in eu but because all my friends are going to start playing on that region I want to)  Everytime I sign up with a new email it just gltiches out and put me back at the same screen with everything filled in so I do the "Im not a robot" task again and it doesn't let me sign in again and keeps doing the same thing. I tried using new emails, new names but it still doesn't work. anyone help

replies.body: Trasherx has made some great points!  Make sure that you are not using an email that's already registered to another account you own.  If you do, you can use a temporary email you have access to for now, then switch back to the one you prefer after registration is complete.  Hope that helps!
Try it a differenct browser. Make sure the email/username is not taken yet, and fill in the task correctly.
